Motion (do it yourself)

For the video, goto https://youtu.be/VPXhHfRwVhQ

Write code in SaxonJS sothat the rectangles will slowly move to each other's place. In the end, the red rectangle will be right and the blue one left.

This is a big one. You will find the a partial solution in the file motion-diy_1_.xslt.

The full solution is in the file motion-diy_2_.xslt.
